full_summary:
---

### TBIPS RFP W8474-24IC11 - Information Technology Service Delivery

**Publication Date**: April 17, 2024
**Tender Closing Date**: May 15, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

The Director General Information Management Project Delivery (DGIMPD) is seeking a service provider to deliver information technology services for the ICAM project.

**Scope of Work**
The selected service provider will be required to provide business and capability planning and business design support to the ICAM project. The scope of work includes:

* One (1) Level 2, and one (1) Level 3 A.1 Application/Software Architect
* Two (2) Level 3 I.5 Information Management Architect
* One (1) Level 3 P.2 Enterprise Architect

**Notice Type**
This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the Services category.

**Procurement Method**
The selected service provider will be chosen through a competitive traditional procurement process.

**Selection Criteria**
The proposal will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Highest combined rating of technical merit and price

**Trade Agreements**
The RFP allows for the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity**
The service provider will be required to deliver services in Ottawa, Canada.

**Contact Information**

* Juan Saenz
* Director of Electronic Systems Procurement 3
* Phone: (343) 596-7090
* Email: [MAT.DESProc.3-4.DOSE@forces.gc.ca](mailto:MAT.DESProc.3-4.DOSE@forces.gc.ca)

**Attachments**
The following attachments are available:

* [Attachment 1: Tender Notice]({{canada Buys link}})
* [Attachment 2: R
